short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI tool that helps you to be more productive. It writes emails from scratch and replies to emails like it was you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email overload is a common issue in today's fast-paced, digital world. With an average of 121 emails received per day, it's easy to feel overwhelmed by the sheer volume of messages in our inboxes. This is where EmailMagic AI comes in, changing the game for those looking to take control of their inbox and improve their productivity.
